rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to an open living area, with a blend of colonial and modern aesthetics. The layout encourages positive energy flow as per Vastu, ensuring that the entrance faces north or east for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining area is designed with a colonial charm. It features wooden finishes and ambient lighting, following Vastu principles by aligning dining space in the eastern direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: This bedroom provides comfortable accommodation for guests. The room is located to maintain privacy while ensuring the main living areas are accessible. It adheres to Vastu guidelines by positioning doors in auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work, placed away from the noisy parts of the house but with a view of the garden, ensuring a balanced environment. The desk is positioned in the northeast corner, considered ideal in Vastu for intellectual pursuits.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with colonial elements such as crown molding and a backsplash that reflects traditional Indian patterns. The placement is designed to keep the cooking area away from the main living spaces, following Vastu practices.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility space for laundry and storage, strategically located near the kitchen to maintain efficiency. Its placement is mindful of Vastu principles regarding energy flow in service areas.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: The primary entry designed with colonial detailing, ensuring a welcoming yet secure entrance in accordance with Vastu recommendations.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Large windows allow natural light into the living areas. East-facing windows are particularly auspicious as per Vastu, enhancing positive energy.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and a relaxing outdoor environment. The design incorporates colonial-style balustrades and seating areas, with careful Vastu considerations for privacy and energy balance.

additional_features.name: Garden Area
additional_features.description: An expansive garden surrounding the townhouse that offers both aesthetic beauty and functional space. The layout is designed to promote relaxation and positive energy, in line with Vastu principles for outdoor spaces.
